description:
Section 73 application to vary the wording of condition 2 of planning permission reference P091813 for the Demolition of 465 (excluding east elevation/facade) and 465A Caledonian Road and the erection of a part six storey, part eight storey and part 11 storey building, plus basement for student accommodation, comprising 350 bed spaces, common room and administrative facilities, office accommodation (Class B1[a] 589 sq.m) and ground floor commercial uses (Class A1/A3/A5 [671 sq.m] ), together with outdoor amenity space and landscaping.  The amendments are:
1.Relocation of the laundry room from the first floor in the southern block to the ground floor adjacent to the student residential entrance
2.replacement of the laundry on the first floor of the southern block with one additional studio unit
3.relocation of part of the lower ground level cycle storage to adjacent to the student residential entrance.  In place of this cycle storage the provision of three studio units. 
4.the omission of the store rooms on the ground floor and their replacement with cycle storage areas
5.relocation of the staircase serving the studio flats to the southern block to adjacent to the two lifts by the student accommodation office
6.relocation of the staircase located in the middle of the east block (Caledonian Road block) from the front to the rear.
7.the omission of the frameless glazing to the existing windows openings in the retained facade
8.the omission of the glazed curtain walling to the top and sides of the existing facade
9.the removal of the handrail to the area of green roof directly above the office accommodation
10.the addition of a handrail around the area of the photovoltaic panels
11.the omission of juliet balconies to the western accommodation block.
